scripts.clean: npm run clean:packages && npm run clean:pods
scripts.clean:packages: rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.clean:pods: cd ios && rm -rf Pods && rm -f Podfile.lock && pod deintegrate && pod install && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.run:ios:dev: npm run set-env -- --env dev && react-native run-ios --configuration Debug --simulator='iPhone 14'
scripts.run:ios:test: npm run set-env -- --env test && react-native run-ios --configuration Debug --simulator='iPhone 14'
scripts.run:ios:mock: npm run set-env -- --env mock && react-native run-ios --configuration Debug --simulator='iPhone 14'
scripts.run:ios:prod: npm run set-env -- --env prod && react-native run-ios --configuration Debug --simulator='iPhone 14'
scripts.clean:run:ios:dev: npm run clean && npm run run:ios:dev
scripts.clean:run:ios:test: npm run clean && npm run run:ios:test
scripts.clean:run:ios:mock: npm run clean && npm run run:ios:mock
scripts.clean:run:ios:prod: npm run clean && npm run run:ios:prod
scripts.run:android:dev: npm run set-env -- --env dev && react-native run-android --variant debug
scripts.run:android:test: npm run set-env -- --env test && react-native run-android --variant debug
scripts.run:android:mock: npm run set-env -- --env mock && react-native run-android --variant debug
scripts.run:android:prod: npm run set-env -- --env prod && react-native run-android --variant debug
scripts.clean:run:android:dev: npm run clean && npm run run:android:dev
scripts.clean:run:android:test: npm run clean && npm run run:android:test
scripts.clean:run:android:mock: npm run clean && npm run run:android:mock
scripts.clean:run:android:prod: npm run clean && npm run run:android:prod
scripts.bundle:android: mkdir -p android/app/src/main/assets && react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.archive:android:alpha: npm run set-env -- --env dev && npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleAlpha && mkdir -p build/alpha && cp app/build/outputs/apk/alpha/app-alpha.apk build/alpha/com.winnebago.owners.alpha.apk
scripts.archive:android:mock: npm run set-env -- --env mock && npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew clean && ./gradlew assembleMock && mkdir -p build/mock && cp app/build/outputs/apk/mock/app-mock.apk build/mock/com.winnebago.owners.mock.apk
scripts.archive:android:release: npm run set-env -- --env prod && npm run bundle:android && cd android && ./gradlew clean && rm -rf app/src/main/res/drawable-* && rm -rf app/src/main/res/raw/* && ./gradlew bundleRelease && mkdir -p build/release && cp app/build/outputs/bundle/release/app-release.aab build/release/com.winnebago.owners.aab
scripts.bundle:ios: react-native bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.archive:ios:alpha: pod install --project-directory=ios && npm run set-env -- --env dev && xcodebuild clean archive -workspace ./ios/Owners.xcworkspace -configuration Alpha -scheme Owners -archivePath ./ios/build/alpha/com.winnebago.owners.alpha.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath ./ios/build/alpha/com.winnebago.owners.alpha.xcarchive -exportPath ./ios/build/alpha -exportOptionsPlist ./ios/ExportOptions.Alpha.plist
scripts.archive:ios:mock: pod install --project-directory=ios && npm run set-env -- --env mock && xcodebuild clean archive -workspace ./ios/Owners.xcworkspace -configuration Mock -scheme Owners -archivePath ./ios/build/mock/com.winnebago.owners.mock.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath ./ios/build/mock/com.winnebago.owners.mock.xcarchive -exportPath ./ios/build/mock -exportOptionsPlist ./ios/ExportOptions.Mock.plist
scripts.archive:ios:release: pod install --project-directory=ios && npm run set-env -- --env prod && xcodebuild clean archive -workspace ./ios/Owners.xcworkspace -configuration Release -scheme Owners -archivePath ./ios/build/release/com.winnebago.owners.xcarchive && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath ./ios/build/release/com.winnebago.owners.xcarchive -exportPath ./ios/build/release -exportOptionsPlist ./ios/ExportOptions.Release.plist
